parameters.query:
INSERT INTO touchpoints (
  id,
  client_id,
  appeal_id,
  type,
  channel,
  direction,
  tenant_id,
  created_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.touchpoint_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.client_id }}'::uuid,
  {{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.appeal_id ? "'" + $('Parse & Validate').item.json.appeal_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }},
  '{{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.type }}',
  '{{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.channel }}',
  '{{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.direction }}',
  {{ $('Parse & Validate').item.json.tenant_id ? "'" + $('Parse & Validate').item.json.tenant_id + "'::uuid" : 'NULL' }},
  NOW()
)
RETURNING *;
